texts.name: Tasabu
texts.biography: The brave northern warrior Tasabu once sent his troops to storm the Freegan citadels. As a result, his army was defeated, and the barbarian himself was captured. The demons processed Tasab's mind a bit and since then he has served them faithfully, helping them fight in unusual conditions for freegans.

specialty.description:
{Logistics}

Give 5% extra bonus per level to Logistics skill.
specialty.name: Logistics
